text:
I just saw a tweet where a little girl wrote a note on her arm for her parents...

...in case the shooter at her school killed her.

I hope all of the gnashing of teeth and rending of clothes by "gun enthusiasts" is worth this girl being terrified.

One year after Parkland, the new Democratic House majority isn’t just offering our thoughts and prayers.  

We’re acting to pass long-overdue legislation to provide common sense background checks, in honor of the victims and families of every community devastated by gun violence.
